title: [CLS] Ethereum Magicians Infinite Endgames: Ethereum Execution
description: A fishbowl-style discussion with core Ethereum contributors and community to publicly discuss the "endgame" of execution on Ethereum. We will discuss what the evolution of Ethereumâ€™s execution layer will look like, L1 vs. L2, settlement vs. execution, enshrined rollups, consensus changes vs. client performance improvements, etc.
